title: PostalCodeRangeSpecification
description: Indicates a range of postalcodes, usually defined as the set of valid codes between [[postalCodeBegin]] and [[postalCodeEnd]], inclusively.

allOf.description: Structured values are used when the value of a property has a more complex structure than simply being a textual value or a reference to another thing.

postalCodeBegin.description: First postal code in a range (included).

postalCodeEnd.description: Last postal code in the range (included). Needs to be after [[postalCodeBegin]].
